attributes.review: Me being the 9 yr old I am I want some Dutch brothers But they closed and I asked trump for some and he said NO NEVER but then I said why and he said NO NEVER FIRST VOTE FOR ME and I said ok I will vote for u to go to jail (boom) and he said well at least u voted my name in something but I said NOW GIMMIE MY DUTCH BROTHERS And he Said Fine and sent me papers In the mail sooooo I threw them away and said NO I WANT MY DUTCH BROTHERS and he tried texting me and then I blocked him because  I don’t have to listen to a cheto/Orange so I blocked every number he had
attributes.title: I really really don’t like this app

attributes.review: I went on the app expecting a great experience but instead my phone was glitching and I honestly couldn’t tell if it was the app or my phone. I did everything to try to fix it and turns out it was just the app.
attributes.title: ITS AWFUL

attributes.title: Trump

attributes.review: The app was filled with so much white supremacy and ignorance it couldn’t stabilize itself for more than three seconds
attributes.title: Super buggy - kept crashing

attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to see what all the fuss was about. Turns out that it’s just the comeback of the annoying orange. 🍊 I am not surprised as to why people are disappointed, the annoying orange was never that funny or entertaining anyway. And they kept asking me to vote for him for president. I was annoyed by how many times I was bombarded with notifications while i was doing much more important tasks like scrolling Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and while staring blankly into space. Sorry, but it’s a no from me. 😬🙃
attributes.title: 👁👄👁 *disappointment*

attributes.review: i wanted to see what this app was about and i was very disappointed. i had this app for less then 24 hours and have already deleted it. this app is completely useless and has no reason to even have been made.
attributes.title: not worth your time
